{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3561746,"name":"jacqueline","username":"jr190","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/919ad9/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-19T15:18:15.295Z","cooked":"

We are trying to set up the new radio and are encountering some issues. for some reason, we can not go to the site to do that more than one time on each device and it also keeps failing. We have finally gotten to the point where it said it was configured on the 3rd laptop we used but it wont let us check the radio status for some reason. we were wondering if this is fine or if there is something else we can do, we are trying to get this fixed before our competition.

Do this steps again and wait until finished.

You can’t access this page?
Connect radio with ethernet and use Network assistant tool for configuring. After that, you should be able to go configuration page.

Also wiring is important and different than competition wiring.

frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net
